query.pigql: q = load "DPS_NPD_AGGREGATED";q = filter q by 'Banner' in {{ selection(Banner_49) }}; q = filter q by 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_47) }}; q = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["2 months ago".."2 months ago"]; q = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in {{ selection(Date_Year_Date_Month_14) }}; q = filter q by 'Cluster' in {{ selection(Cluster_17) }}; q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_18) }}; q = filter q by 'Region' in {{ selection(Region_19) }}; q = filter q by 'Province' in {{ selection(Province_20) }}; q = filter q by 'City' in {{ selection(City_21) }}; q = filter q by 'Sales_territory' in {{ selection(Sales_territory_22) }}; q = filter q by 'Sales_area' in {{ selection(Sales_area_23) }}; q = filter q by 'Trade_Format' in {{ selection(Trade_Format_24) }}; q = filter q by 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_25) }}; q = filter q by 'Subchannel' in {{ selection(Subchannel_26) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer_type' in {{ selection(Customer_type_27) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer_subtype' in {{ selection(Customer_subtype_28) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_29) }}; q = filter q by 'Product_division' in {{ selection(Product_division_30) }}; q = filter q by 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_31) }}; q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate sum('Audited_SKUs') as 'sum_Audited_SKUs', sum('Score') as 'sum_Score',  sum('Score')/sum('Audited_SKUs') as 'ave_Score'; q = limit q 2000;

q = load "DPS_NPD_AGGREGATED"; q = filter q by 'Banner' in {{ selection(Banner_49) }}; q = filter q by 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_47) }}; q = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["1 month ago".."1 month ago"]; q = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in {{ selection(Date_Year_Date_Month_14) }}; q = filter q by 'Cluster' in {{ selection(Cluster_17) }}; q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_18) }}; q = filter q by 'Region' in {{ selection(Region_19) }}; q = filter q by 'Province' in {{ selection(Province_20) }}; q = filter q by 'City' in {{ selection(City_21) }}; q = filter q by 'Sales_territory' in {{ selection(Sales_territory_22) }}; q = filter q by 'Sales_area' in {{ selection(Sales_area_23) }}; q = filter q by 'Trade_Format' in {{ selection(Trade_Format_24) }}; q = filter q by 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_25) }}; q = filter q by 'Subchannel' in {{ selection(Subchannel_26) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer_type' in {{ selection(Customer_type_27) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer_subtype' in {{ selection(Customer_subtype_28) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_29) }}; q = filter q by 'Product_division' in {{ selection(Product_division_30) }}; q = filter q by 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_31) }}; q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate sum('Audited_SKUs') as 'sum_Audited_SKUs', sum('Score') as 'sum_Score',  sum('Score')/sum('Audited_SKUs') as 'ave_Score'; q = limit q 2000;

q = load "DPS_NPD_AGGREGATED";q = filter q by 'Banner' in {{ selection(Banner_49) }}; q = filter q by 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_47) }}; q = filter q by 'Cluster' in {{ selection(Cluster_17) }}; q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_18) }}; q = filter q by 'Region' in {{ selection(Region_19) }}; q = filter q by 'Province' in {{ selection(Province_20) }}; q = filter q by 'City' in {{ selection(City_21) }}; q = filter q by 'Sales_territory' in {{ selection(Sales_territory_22) }}; q = filter q by 'Sales_area' in {{ selection(Sales_area_23) }}; q = filter q by 'Trade_Format' in {{ selection(Trade_Format_24) }}; q = filter q by 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_25) }}; q = filter q by 'Subchannel' in {{ selection(Subchannel_26) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer_type' in {{ selection(Customer_type_27) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer_subtype' in {{ selection(Customer_subtype_28) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_29) }}; q = filter q by 'Product_division' in {{ selection(Product_division_30) }}; q = filter q by 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_31) }}; q = group q by ('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month'); q = foreach q generate 'Date_of_audit_Year' as 'Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month' as 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Year' + "~~~" + 'Date_of_audit_Month' as 'Date_of_audit_Year~~~Date_of_audit_Month', sum('Audited_SKUs') as 'sum_Audited_SKUs', sum('Score') as 'sum_Score',  sum('Score')/sum('Audited_SKUs') as 'ave_Score'; q = limit q 2000;

q = load "DPS_NPD_AGGREGATED";q = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in {{ selection(Date_Year_Date_Month_14) }}; q = filter q by 'Banner' in {{ selection(Banner_49) }}; q = filter q by 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_47) }}; q = filter q by 'Cluster' in {{ selection(Cluster_17) }}; q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_18) }}; q = filter q by 'Region' in {{ selection(Region_19) }}; q = filter q by 'Province' in {{ selection(Province_20) }}; q = filter q by 'City' in {{ selection(City_21) }}; q = filter q by 'Sales_territory' in {{ selection(Sales_territory_22) }}; q = filter q by 'Sales_area' in {{ selection(Sales_area_23) }}; q = filter q by 'Trade_Format' in {{ selection(Trade_Format_24) }}; q = filter q by 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_25) }}; q = filter q by 'Subchannel' in {{ selection(Subchannel_26) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer_type' in {{ selection(Customer_type_27) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer_subtype' in {{ selection(Customer_subtype_28) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_29) }}; q = filter q by 'Product_division' in {{ selection(Product_division_30) }}; q = filter q by 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_31) }}; q = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["2 month ago".."1 month ahead"];r = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["2 month ago".."2 month ago"];w = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["1 month ago".."1 month ago"];c = cogroup q by all, r by all, w by all; c = foreach c generate sum(r.Score)/sum(r.Audited_SKUs)*100  as 'r_Scores', sum(w.Score)/sum(w.Audited_SKUs)*100  as 'w_Scores', ( (sum(w.Score)/sum(w.Audited_SKUs))*100) - ((sum(r.Score)/sum(r.Audited_SKUs))*100) as 'Percent_Diff';

q = load "DPS_NPD_RAW"; q = filter q by 'Banner' in {{ selection(Banner_49) }}; q = filter q by 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_47) }}; q = filter q by 'Cluster' in {{ selection(Cluster_17) }}; q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_18) }}; q = filter q by 'Region' in {{ selection(Region_19) }}; q = filter q by 'Province' in {{ selection(Province_20) }}; q = filter q by 'City' in {{ selection(City_21) }};  q = filter q by 'Sales_territory' in {{ selection(Sales_territory_22) }}; q = filter q by 'Sales_area' in {{ selection(Sales_area_23) }}; q = filter q by 'Trade_Format' in {{ selection(Trade_Format_24) }}; q = filter q by 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_25) }}; q = filter q by 'Subchannel' in {{ selection(Subchannel_26) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer_type' in {{ selection(Customer_type_27) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer_subtype' in {{ selection(Customer_subtype_28) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_29) }}; q = filter q by 'Product_division' in {{ selection(Product_division_30) }}; q = filter q by 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_31) }}; cur = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["2 months ago".."2 months ago"]; last = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["3 months ago".."3 months ago"]; diff = group cur by 'SKU', last by 'SKU'; diff = foreach diff generate last.SKU as 'SKU',avg(last['NPD']) as 'Last Month', avg(cur['NPD']) as 'Current Month', (avg(cur['NPD'])-avg(last['NPD'])) as 'Percent_Diff';

parameters.text:
This chart displays the % of NPD SKUs that were available in the enrolled stores for the
country over a period of last 12 months.

This chart lists all the audited NPD SKUs in the country, the % of
 enrolled stores that they were available in the latest month,
and the variance in availability from the previous month.

This chart displays the % of NPD SKUs that were available in the enrolled stores for the country
in the latest month.

This chart displays the % of NPD SKUs that were available in the enrolled stores across all the
Channels in the country in the latest month.

This chart displays the % of 4P, 5P and 6P stores that were Pack compliant for the
country in the latest month.

This chart displays the % of enrolled stores that were Pack compliant for the
country over a period of last 12 months.

This chart displays the % of enrolled stores that were Pack compliant across all the Channels 
in the country in the latest month.

This chart displays the % of enrolled stores that were Pack compliant
for the latest month.

This chart displays the % of MT enrolled stores that were Pack compliant across all the
Product categories in the country in the latest month.

This chart displays the % of enrolled stores that were Pack compliant in different regions
of the country in the latest month.

This chart displays the % of NPD SKUs that were available in the enrolled stores for
Top Customers within a country in the latest month.

This chart displays the % of NPD SKUs that were available in 4P, 5P and 6P
stores in the country in the latest month.

This chart displays the % of enrolled stores for Top Customers within a country which were
Pack Compliant in the latest month.

This chart displays the % of NPD SKUs that were available in enrolled stores in different regions
of the country in the latest month.

This chart displays the % of NPD SKUs that were available in MT enrolled stores across all the
Product categories in the country in the latest month.
